page.title: 20HITCHIN,A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: When I wake up I get dressed and then I go downstairs and have my breakfast. After I go to wash and then put my coat and shoes on. Then I get all my stuff and go to school. At school we have the register and then a home base until 9.20. We have an assembly then come back to the classroom to do some work. After play we do some Language until 11.30 when we do some tables until 12 o'clock. At twelve o'clock we go to play rounders on the field. At 1.30 we go back to the classroom. we do some work until 3 o'clock when we have a home base until 3.30. At 3.30 we go home. When I get home I have my dinner and then I watch television until 9 o'clock when I go to bed. When I am in bed I read a story.
